metadata.description: OMG, you HAVE to see this week's Olive Garden specials! 🍝 We've got the scoop on Buy One Take One, Never Ending Pasta, and more. See the deals! 👇
metadata.pageGoal: Inform users about the latest Olive Garden specials, deals, and promotions to drive interest and store visits.

data.h1: Olive Garden Specials, Deals & Promos You CANNOT Miss! 🤑
data.tagline: Your ultimate guide to the most legendary deals. Get ready to feast like royalty without breaking the bank!

data.htmlContent: OMG, listen up! 📣 Olive Garden is dropping some legendary deals that'll make your wallet happy and your stomach even happier. From the iconic Buy One, Take One to the glorious Never-Ending Pasta Bowl, we're talking major foodie wins. Get ready to feast like royalty without spending a fortune. Let's get this bread(stick)! 🥖

data.title: Current Olive Garden Specials for September 2025 🔥
rows: Unlimited servings of your fave pasta dishes. Yes, UNLIMITED.
Eat a delicious meal now, take a second one home for later. It's a win-win!
Add an extra entrée to your order for just SIX BUCKS. Unreal.

items.title: Family Style Meals 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
items.description: Got a whole crew to feed? Say less. Olive Garden's Family Style Meals are here to save the day, serving 4-12 people.

items.title: Never Ending Classics 🍝
items.description: This is not a drill! The Never Ending Classics are BACK, starting at just $11.99! Includes unlimited breadsticks, soup, AND salad.

items.title: Buy One, Take One ✌️
items.description: Two meals are better than one. Get a hot entrée now, plus a chilled one to take home. Available for To-Go orders too!

items.title: $6 Take Home Entrées 🥡
items.description: Add a freshly prepared, chilled classic entrée to any dine-in order. It's the perfect way to score lunch for tomorrow.

items.question: What is Olive Garden’s Buy One, Take One deal?
items.answer: Order an entrée starting at $12.99 and take a second one home for free. It also includes unlimited soup or salad and breadsticks. It's available for a limited time, so get on it!

items.question: Does Olive Garden still have the Never-Ending Pasta Bowl?
items.answer: YES! It starts at $13.99 and you get unlimited pasta, sauce, and soup. You can add meat for an extra charge. It's the best.

items.question: What are Olive Garden’s lunch specials?
items.answer: They have a bunch! Unlimited Soup, Salad & Breadsticks for $9.99, Lunch Duos starting at $7.99, and Lunch-Sized Favorites also starting at $7.99. They're available Monday-Friday until 3 PM.
